attributes.action: Re-openning of Rafah crossing for humanetarian and medical aid delivery to Gaza
attributes.additional_details: As the onslaught of Gaza and its defenceless people conitues, emergency medical services are facing an extremely difficult task of handling  the wounded and sick on ground. With Israel targeting medical facilities and the siege on its infrastructures Gaza is in a humanetarian crisis. The need for medical aid to be delivered to Gaza is at its most urgent need. We ask our politician to work and ask for Rafah crossing to be opened for delivery of medical and most basic needs of people of Gaza.
